room1.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move east or north.

room2.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move west, north or east.

room3.message: You hear a loud roar! Your options are to move west, north or east.

room4.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move west or north.

room5.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move south or east.

room6.message: You hear a loud roar! Your options are to move north, south or west.

room7.message: You found the monster (and died)! GAME OVER! .

room8.message: You hear a loud roar! Your options are to move west, north or south.

room9.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move north or east.

room10.message: You feel a gentle breeze~ Your option is to move south, east or west.

room11.message: You hear a loud roar! Your options are to move west, north, east or south.

room12.message: You hear nothing. Your options are to move south or west.

room13.message: You feel a gentle breeze~ Dead end! Your options are to move south.

room15.message: You feel a gentle breeze~ Your options are to move west, east or south.

room16.message: You hear nothing. Dead end! Your options are to move west.
